mapper.select:
DECLARE @JSON_PARAM NVARCHAR(2000), @ERROR_DESC NVARCHAR(2000) --※ 주의 : Json 파람조건에 엔터키 값 없이 해야함. SET @JSON_PARAM = '{"COMP_CODE":"${S_COMP_CODE}","ST_DATE":"${START_DATE}","FR_DATE":"${DATE_FR}","TO_DATE":"${DATE_TO}","DIV_CODE_LIST1":"${DIV_CODE1}","DIV_CODE_LIST2":"${DIV_CODE2}","DIV_CODE_LIST3":"${DIV_CODE3}","DIV_CODE_LIST4":"${DIV_CODE4}","DIV_CODE_LIST5":"${DIV_CODE5}","DIV_CODE_LIST6":"${DIV_CODE6}","AMT_UNIT":"${AMT_UNIT}","TAB_SEL":"${DIVI}","ACCT_NAME":"${ACCOUNT_NAME}","GUBUN":"${GUBUN}","KEY_VALUE":"","UPDATE_DB_USER":"${S_USER_ID}","LANG_TYPE":"${S_LANG_CODE}"}'
exec uniLITE.USP_ACCNT_AGC150SKR @JSON_PARAM, @ERROR_DESC OUTPUT
--SELECT @ERROR_DESC AS ERROR_DESC

--agc150skr.Cagc150skr[fnMakeSQL]Query5 WITH T_AGB100T AS ( SELECT DIV_CODE , DEPT_CODE , CASE ISNULL((SELECT ACCNT_SPEC FROM ABA400T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND ACCNT = A.ACCNT),'') WHEN 'D2' THEN (SELECT ACCNT FROM ABA400T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND ISNULL(ACCNT_SPEC,'') = 'D1' AND ISNULL(GROUP_YN,'') = 'N' AND ISNULL(SLIP_SW,'') = 'Y') ELSE ACCNT END AS ACCNT , AC_DATE , P_ACCNT , INPUT_PATH , MONEY_UNIT , DR_AMT_I , CR_AMT_I , DR_FOR_AMT_I , CR_FOR_AMT_I , ACCNT_SPEC , SPEC_DIVI , PROFIT_DIVI , JAN_DIVI , BLN_DIVI FROM AGB100TV A WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' ) SELECT MAX(GBN) AS GRP , ACCNT_CD , CASE ISNULL(ACCNT,'') WHEN '' THEN CASE MAX(ISNULL(OPT_DIVI,'')) WHEN '1' THEN CASE WHEN SUM(ISNULL(TOT_AMT_I,0.0)) >= 0 THEN ISNULL((SELECT ACCNT_NAME FROM ABA120T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND GUBUN = N'03' AND DIVI = N'10' AND ACCNT_CD = Z.ACCNT_CD),'') ELSE ISNULL((SELECT ACCNT_NAME FROM ABA120T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND GUBUN = N'03' AND DIVI = N'10' AND ACCNT_CD = (SELECT MIN(ACCNT_CD) FROM ABA120T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND GUBUN = N'03' AND DIVI = N'10' AND ACCNT_CD >= Z.ACCNT_CD AND OPT_DIVI = '2')),'') END ELSE ISNULL((SELECT ACCNT_NAME FROM ABA120T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND GUBUN = N'03' AND DIVI = N'10' AND ACCNT_CD = Z.ACCNT_CD),'') END ELSE ' ' + ISNULL((SELECT AC_FULL_NAME FROM ABA400T WHERE COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND ACCNT = Z.ACCNT),'') END AS ACCNT_NAME , SUM(TOT_AMT_I) AS TOT_AMT_I , SUM(AMT_I1) AS AMT_I1 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_1 , SUM(AMT_I2) AS AMT_I2 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_2 , SUM(AMT_I3) AS AMT_I3 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_3 , SUM(AMT_I4) AS AMT_I4 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_4 , SUM(AMT_I5) AS AMT_I5 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_5 , SUM(AMT_I6) AS AMT_I6 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_6 , CASE ISNULL(ACCNT,'') WHEN '' THEN ISNULL(MAX(DIS_DIVI),'') ELSE '2' END AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(OPT_DIVI) AS OPT_DIVI FROM ( SELECT MAX(GBN) AS GBN , MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ , ACCNT_CD , ACCNT , SUM(AMT_I) AS TOT_AMT_I , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN ('01') THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I1 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN ('') THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I2 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN ('') THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I3 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN ('') THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I4 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN ('') THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I5 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN ('') THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I6 , MAX(DIS_DIVI) AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(OPT_DIVI) AS OPT_DIVI FROM (--agc150skr.Cagc150skr[fnGetThisTerm]Query4 SELECT '1' AS GBN , MAX(ISNULL(SEQ,0 )) AS SEQ , ISNULL(ACCNT_CD,'') AS ACCNT_CD , ISNULL(ACCNT,'') AS ACCNT , ISNULL(DIV_CODE,'') AS DIV_CODE , MAX(ISNULL(DIS_DIVI,'')) AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(ISNULL(OPT_DIVI,'')) AS OPT_DIVI , ROUND(SUM(ISNULL(AMT_I,0.0))/1,0,1) AS AMT_I FROM ( SELECT DIVI , SEQ , ACCNT_CD , CASE OPT_DIVI WHEN '4' THEN ACCNT ELSE '' END AS ACCNT , OPT_DIVI , DIS_DIVI , (CASE DR_CR WHEN '10' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I10,0.0) WHEN '20' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I20,0.0) WHEN '30' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I30,0.0) WHEN '40' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I30,0.0) - ISNULL(AMT_I20,0.0) WHEN '50' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I50,0.0) WHEN '60' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I60,0.0) WHEN '70' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I50,0.0) - ISNULL(AMT_I60,0.0) WHEN '80' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I80,0.0) END) * (CASE CAL_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN 1 WHEN '2' THEN (-1) END) AS AMT_I , DIV_CODE FROM ( SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A , T_AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND B.AC_DATE = N'201801' AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('A0','10','11') AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') <> '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') <> '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN ('01','','','','','')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A , T_AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND B.AC_DATE = N'201801' AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('A0','10','11') AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') <> '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') <> '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN ('01','','','','','')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A , T_AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND B.AC_DATE >= N'201801' AND B.AC_DATE <= N'20181231' AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') <> '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') <> '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN ('01','','','','','')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , DR_AMT_I AS AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A , T_AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND B.AC_DATE >= N'20180101' AND B.AC_DATE <= N'20181231' AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') <> '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') <> '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN ('01','','','','','')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , CR_AMT_I AS AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A , T_AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND B.AC_DATE >= N'20180101' AND B.AC_DATE <= N'20181231' AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') <> '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') <> '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN ('01','','','','','')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , CR_AMT_I AS AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A , T_AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND B.AC_DATE >= N'20180101' AND B.AC_DATE <= N'20181231' AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('52','58') AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') <> '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') <> '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN ('01','','','','','') ) B
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , '' AS ACCNT , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , NULL AS AMT_I , '' AS DIV_CODE FROM ABA120T A WHERE A.COMP_CODE = N'MASTER' AND A.GUBUN = N'03' AND A.DIVI = N'10' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') = '3' AND ISNULL(A.OPT_DIVI,'') <> '2' ) Z GROUP BY Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT, Z.DIV_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT, Z.DIV_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.SEQ, Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT ORDER BY Z.SEQ, Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT

--agc130skr.Cagc130skr[fnGetBasicInfo] Query01 SELECT A.FN_DATE , A.TO_DATE , B.CODE_NAME , ISNULL(B.REF_CODE1, '1') AS AMT_UNIT , ISNULL(C.AMT_POINT, '3') AS AMT_POINT , ISNULL(D.FORMAT_IN, '0') AS FORMAT_IN FROM BOR100T AS A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN BSA100T AS B WITH (NOLOCK) ON B.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND B.MAIN_CODE = 'B042' AND B.SUB_CODE = N'1' LEFT JOIN ABA100T AS C WITH (NOLOCK) ON C.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND C.BASE_CODE = '01' LEFT JOIN BSA110T AS D WITH (NOLOCK) ON D.COMP_CODE = A.COMP_CODE AND D.JOB_CODE = '13' WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE}

IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.tables where name= '#AGB100T') DROP TABLE #AGB100T
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON CREATE TABLE #AGB100T( DIV_CODE nvarchar(80) NOT NULL, DEPT_CODE nvarchar(8) NOT NULL, ACCNT nvarchar(16) NULL, AC_DATE nvarchar(8) NOT NULL, P_ACCNT nvarchar(16) NOT NULL, INPUT_PATH nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, MONEY_UNIT nvarchar(3) NOT NULL, DR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, CR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, DR_FOR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, CR_FOR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, ACCNT_SPEC nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, SPEC_DIVI nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, PROFIT_DIVI nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, JAN_DIVI nvarchar(1) NOT NULL, BLN_DIVI nvarchar(1) NOT NULL )
BEGIN INSERT INTO #AGB100T(DIV_CODE , DEPT_CODE ,ACCNT ,AC_DATE ,P_ACCNT ,INPUT_PATH ,MONEY_UNIT , DR_AMT_I ,CR_AMT_I ,DR_FOR_AMT_I,CR_FOR_AMT_I,ACCNT_SPEC,SPEC_DIVI, PROFIT_DIVI,JAN_DIVI,BLN_DIVI) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT DIV_CODE , DEPT_CODE , CASE ISNULL((SELECT ACCNT_SPEC FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ACCNT = A.ACCNT),'') WHEN 'D2' THEN (SELECT ACCNT FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ISNULL(ACCNT_SPEC,'') = 'D1' AND ISNULL(GROUP_YN,'') = 'N' AND ISNULL(SLIP_SW,'') = 'Y') ELSE ACCNT END AS ACCNT , AC_DATE , P_ACCNT , INPUT_PATH , MONEY_UNIT , DR_AMT_I , CR_AMT_I , DR_FOR_AMT_I , CR_FOR_AMT_I , ACCNT_SPEC , SPEC_DIVI , PROFIT_DIVI , JAN_DIVI , BLN_DIVI FROM AGB100TV A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} ) A END
--agc150skr.Cagc150skr[fnMakeSQL]Query5 SELECT MAX(GBN) AS GRP , ACCNT_CD , CASE ISNULL(ACCNT,'') WHEN '' THEN CASE MAX(ISNULL(OPT_DIVI,'')) WHEN '1' THEN CASE WHEN SUM(ISNULL(TOT_AMT_I,0.0)) >= 0 THEN ISNULL((SELECT ${ACCNT_NAME} FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD = Z.ACCNT_CD),'') ELSE ISNULL((SELECT ${ACCNT_NAME} FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD = (SELECT MIN(ACCNT_CD) FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD >= Z.ACCNT_CD AND OPT_DIVI = '2')),'') END ELSE ISNULL((SELECT ${ACCNT_NAME} FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD = Z.ACCNT_CD),'') END ELSE ' ' + ISNULL((SELECT ${AC_FULL_NAME} FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ACCNT = Z.ACCNT),'') END AS ACCNT_NAME , SUM(TOT_AMT_I) AS TOT_AMT_I , SUM(AMT_I1) AS AMT_I1 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_1 , SUM(AMT_I2) AS AMT_I2 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_2 , SUM(AMT_I3) AS AMT_I3 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_3 , SUM(AMT_I4) AS AMT_I4 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_4 , SUM(AMT_I5) AS AMT_I5 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_5 , SUM(AMT_I6) AS AMT_I6 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_6 , CASE ISNULL(ACCNT,'') WHEN '' THEN ISNULL(MAX(DIS_DIVI),'') ELSE '2' END AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(OPT_DIVI) AS OPT_DIVI FROM ( SELECT MAX(GBN) AS GBN , MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ , ACCNT_CD , ACCNT , SUM(AMT_I) AS TOT_AMT_I , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I1 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I2 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I3 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I4 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I5 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I6 , MAX(DIS_DIVI) AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(OPT_DIVI) AS OPT_DIVI FROM (--agc150skr.Cagc150skr[fnGetThisTerm]Query4 SELECT '1' AS GBN , MAX(ISNULL(SEQ,0 )) AS SEQ , ISNULL(ACCNT_CD,'') AS ACCNT_CD , ISNULL(ACCNT,'') AS ACCNT , ISNULL(DIV_CODE,'') AS DIV_CODE , MAX(ISNULL(DIS_DIVI,'')) AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(ISNULL(OPT_DIVI,'')) AS OPT_DIVI , ROUND(SUM(ISNULL(AMT_I,0.0))/1,0,1) AS AMT_I FROM ( SELECT DIVI , SEQ , ACCNT_CD , CASE OPT_DIVI WHEN '4' THEN ACCNT ELSE '' END AS ACCNT , OPT_DIVI , DIS_DIVI , (CASE DR_CR WHEN '10' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I10,0.0) WHEN '20' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I20,0.0) WHEN '30' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I30,0.0) WHEN '40' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I30,0.0) - ISNULL(AMT_I20,0.0) WHEN '50' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I50,0.0) WHEN '60' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I60,0.0) WHEN '70' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I50,0.0) - ISNULL(AMT_I60,0.0) WHEN '80' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I80,0.0) END) * (CASE CAL_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN 1 WHEN '2' THEN (-1) END) AS AMT_I , DIV_CODE FROM ( SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE = #{START_DATE} AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('A0','10','11') AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{START_DATE} AND B.AC_DATE < #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{START_DATE} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , DR_AMT_I AS AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{DATE_FR} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , CR_AMT_I AS AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{DATE_FR} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , CR_AMT_I AS AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{DATE_FR} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('52','58') AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
) B
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , '' AS ACCNT , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , NULL AS AMT_I , '' AS DIV_CODE FROM ABA120T A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') = '3' AND ISNULL(A.OPT_DIVI,'') != '2' ) Z GROUP BY Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT, Z.DIV_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT, Z.DIV_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.SEQ, Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT ORDER BY Z.SEQ, Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT

IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.tables where name= '#AGB100T') DROP TABLE #AGB100T
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON CREATE TABLE #AGB100T( DIV_CODE nvarchar(80) NOT NULL, DEPT_CODE nvarchar(8) NOT NULL, ACCNT nvarchar(16) NULL, AC_DATE nvarchar(8) NOT NULL, P_ACCNT nvarchar(16) NOT NULL, INPUT_PATH nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, MONEY_UNIT nvarchar(3) NOT NULL, DR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, CR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, DR_FOR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, CR_FOR_AMT_I numeric(30, 6) NOT NULL, ACCNT_SPEC nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, SPEC_DIVI nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, PROFIT_DIVI nvarchar(2) NOT NULL, JAN_DIVI nvarchar(1) NOT NULL, BLN_DIVI nvarchar(1) NOT NULL )
BEGIN INSERT INTO #AGB100T(DIV_CODE, DEPT_CODE, ACCNT, AC_DATE , P_ACCNT , INPUT_PATH , MONEY_UNIT , DR_AMT_I , CR_AMT_I, DR_FOR_AMT_I, CR_FOR_AMT_I , ACCNT_SPEC , SPEC_DIVI , PROFIT_DIVI , JAN_DIVI, BLN_DIVI) SELECT DIV_CODE , DEPT_CODE , CASE ISNULL((SELECT ACCNT_SPEC FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ACCNT = A.ACCNT),'') WHEN 'D2' THEN (SELECT ACCNT FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ISNULL(ACCNT_SPEC,'') = 'D1' AND ISNULL(GROUP_YN,'') = 'N' AND ISNULL(SLIP_SW,'') = 'Y') ELSE ACCNT END AS ACCNT , AC_DATE , P_ACCNT , INPUT_PATH , MONEY_UNIT , DR_AMT_I , CR_AMT_I , DR_FOR_AMT_I , CR_FOR_AMT_I , ACCNT_SPEC , SPEC_DIVI , PROFIT_DIVI , JAN_DIVI , BLN_DIVI FROM AGB100TV A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} END
--agc150skr.Cagc150skr[fnMakeSQL]Query5 SELECT MAX(GBN) AS GRP , ACCNT_CD , CASE ISNULL(ACCNT,'') WHEN '' THEN CASE MAX(ISNULL(OPT_DIVI,'')) WHEN '1' THEN CASE WHEN SUM(ISNULL(TOT_AMT_I,0.0)) >= 0 THEN ISNULL((SELECT ${ACCNT_NAME} FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD = Z.ACCNT_CD),'') ELSE ISNULL((SELECT ${ACCNT_NAME} FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD = (SELECT MIN(ACCNT_CD) FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD >= Z.ACCNT_CD AND OPT_DIVI = '2')),'') END ELSE ISNULL((SELECT ${ACCNT_NAME} FROM ABA120T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ACCNT_CD = Z.ACCNT_CD),'') END ELSE ' ' + ISNULL((SELECT ${AC_FULL_NAME} FROM ABA400T WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND ACCNT = Z.ACCNT),'') END AS ACCNT_NAME , SUM(TOT_AMT_I) AS TOT_AMT_I , SUM(AMT_I1) AS AMT_I1 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_1 , SUM(AMT_I2) AS AMT_I2 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_2 , SUM(AMT_I3) AS AMT_I3 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_3 , SUM(AMT_I4) AS AMT_I4 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_4 , SUM(AMT_I5) AS AMT_I5 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_5 , SUM(AMT_I6) AS AMT_I6 , CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RATE_6 , CASE ISNULL(ACCNT,'') WHEN '' THEN ISNULL(MAX(DIS_DIVI),'') ELSE '2' END AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(OPT_DIVI) AS OPT_DIVI FROM ( SELECT MAX(GBN) AS GBN , MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ , ACCNT_CD , ACCNT , SUM(AMT_I) AS TOT_AMT_I , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I1 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I2 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I3 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I4 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I5 , SUM(CASE WHEN DIV_CODE IN
#{item}
('')
THEN AMT_I ELSE 0.0 END) AS AMT_I6 , MAX(DIS_DIVI) AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(OPT_DIVI) AS OPT_DIVI FROM (--agc150skr.Cagc150skr[fnGetThisTerm]Query4 SELECT '1' AS GBN , MAX(ISNULL(SEQ,0 )) AS SEQ , ISNULL(ACCNT_CD,'') AS ACCNT_CD , ISNULL(ACCNT,'') AS ACCNT , ISNULL(DIV_CODE,'') AS DIV_CODE , MAX(ISNULL(DIS_DIVI,'')) AS DIS_DIVI , MAX(ISNULL(OPT_DIVI,'')) AS OPT_DIVI , ROUND(SUM(ISNULL(AMT_I,0.0))/1,0,1) AS AMT_I FROM ( SELECT DIVI , SEQ , ACCNT_CD , CASE OPT_DIVI WHEN '4' THEN ACCNT ELSE '' END AS ACCNT , OPT_DIVI , DIS_DIVI , (CASE DR_CR WHEN '10' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I10,0.0) WHEN '20' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I20,0.0) WHEN '30' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I30,0.0) WHEN '40' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I30,0.0) - ISNULL(AMT_I20,0.0) WHEN '50' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I50,0.0) WHEN '60' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I60,0.0) WHEN '70' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I50,0.0) - ISNULL(AMT_I60,0.0) WHEN '80' THEN ISNULL(AMT_I80,0.0) END) * (CASE CAL_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN 1 WHEN '2' THEN (-1) END) AS AMT_I , DIV_CODE FROM ( SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE = #{START_DATE} AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('A0','10','11') AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{START_DATE} AND B.AC_DATE < #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , CASE JAN_DIVI WHEN '1' THEN ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) WHEN '2' THEN ISNULL(CR_AMT_I,0.0) - ISNULL(DR_AMT_I,0.0) ELSE 0.0 END AS AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{START_DATE} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , DR_AMT_I AS AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{DATE_FR} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , CR_AMT_I AS AMT_I60 , NULL AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{DATE_FR} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , A.ACCNT , A.DR_CR , A.CAL_DIVI , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , DIV_CODE , NULL AMT_I10 , NULL AMT_I20 , NULL AMT_I30 , NULL AMT_I50 , NULL AMT_I60 , CR_AMT_I AS AMT_I80 FROM ABA120TV A WITH (NOLOCK) , #AGB100T B WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND B.AC_DATE >= #{DATE_FR} AND B.AC_DATE <= #{DATE_TO} AND B.INPUT_PATH IN ('52','58') AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND A.ACCNT = B.ACCNT AND ISNULL(A.DR_CR,'') != '90' AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') != '4' AND ISNULL(B.DIV_CODE,'') IN
#{item}
('')
) B
UNION ALL
SELECT A.DIVI , A.SEQ , A.ACCNT_CD , '' AS ACCNT , A.OPT_DIVI , A.DIS_DIVI , NULL AS AMT_I , '' AS DIV_CODE FROM ABA120T A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COMP_CODE = #{S_COMP_CODE} AND A.GUBUN = #{GUBUN} AND A.DIVI = #{DIVI} AND ISNULL(A.DIS_DIVI,'') = '3' AND ISNULL(A.OPT_DIVI,'') != '2' ) Z GROUP BY Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT, Z.DIV_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT, Z.DIV_CODE ) Z GROUP BY Z.SEQ, Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT ORDER BY Z.SEQ, Z.ACCNT_CD, Z.ACCNT
